response.overview: This fantastic collection of big-name stars of the 1960s and 70s leads off with a slightly earlier hillside cookout film, in which a trio of picnickers enjoys a little baseball and jump rope with their weenies. The 60s fare includes a commendable assortment of blondes, brunettes, and beehives, and even one couple getting a little frisky, but most fans will appreciate several familiar faces in particular. Spectacular 70s pinup Roberta Pedon appears in three legendary clips. In the first she runs up the hot water bill in a prolonged solo shower scene.
response.title: Nudie Cuties: Volume 12
